title: Introduction to BasaltCRM
content:
# Introduction to BasaltCRM

Welcome to **BasaltCRM**, the all-in-one Artificial Intelligence-assisted OS designed specifically to empower businesses with sophisticated technology. BasaltCRM unifies your entire business operation into a single, intelligent workspace.

## Core Capabilities

BasaltCRM is more than just a CRM; it's a complete business engine.

### 1. Sales Intelligence & FlowState
Maximize conversions with AI-driven insights and visual workflow automation.
*   **Pipeline Management**: Visual Kanban boards for deals.
*   **FlowState**: Build complex, visual workflows to automate lead handling and team actions.

### 2. Operational Efficiency
*   **Project Boards**: Manage tasks, files, and team collaboration in one place.
*   **Invoicing**: Generate contracts and invoices instantly from closed deals.

### 3. AI-First Design
*   **VoiceHub**: Deploy AI agents that can talk to your customers on the phone.
*   **Sequences**: Automated multi-channel outreach that feels personal.
*   **Smart Chat**: An omnipresent assistant that knows your business context.

## Navigation Overview

*   **Dashboard**: Your command center with high-level KPIs.
*   **CRM**: Contacts, Companies, and Deals.
*   **University**: Interactive guides and architectural diagrams to master the platform.
*   **Projects**: Task management and deliverables.
*   **Sequences**: Automated outreach campaigns.
*   **VoiceHub**: AI voice agent configuration.

## Need Help?

*   **Docs**: You are here!
*   **University**: Visit [/university](/en/crm/university) for visual walkthroughs.
*   **Discord**: Join our community for real-time engineering support.

title: Initial Setup & Configuration
content:
# Initial Setup & Configuration

Configure your workspace to match your business processes.

## 1. Company Profile

Navigate to **Settings > My Account**. This information appears on official documents like Invoices and Quotes.

## 2. Branding (White Labeling)

Customizing the client-facing experience in **Settings > Branding**.
*   **Logo**: Upload a high-resolution PNG.
*   **Colors**: Set your primary brand color.

## 3. Departmental Roles & Permissions

BasaltCRM features a granular permission system. Manage roles in **Settings > Roles**.
*   **Organization Roles**: Top-level access (Super Admin, Admin, Member).
*   **Department Roles**: Specific permissions scoped to departments (e.g., Sales Manager, Support Specialist).

## 4. User Management

Invite your team in **Admin > Users**. Assign them to specific departments to control their access levels across the platform.

## 5. Module Selection

Enable only what you need in **Settings > Modules** to keep your interface clean and focused.

title: CRM Core: Contacts & Accounts
content:
# Contacts & Accounts

Manage your business ecosystem with granular control over people and organizations.

## The Data Model

BasaltCRM uses a B2B data model:
*   **Accounts**: Organizations or Companies. This is the parent entity.
*   **Contacts**: Individuals linked to an Account or standalone.

## Relationship Flow

Understand how entities connect: 
1.  **Lead**: A cold prospect.
2.  **Contact**: Created when outreach begins or manually.
3.  **Account**: Created when a deal is closed or manually.

For a visual representation of these relationships, check the **Entity Relationships** diagram in the [University](/en/crm/university).

title: Leads & Pipeline Management
content:
# Leads & Pipeline Management

Turn cold prospects into loyal customers using our visual pipeline and AI tools.

## Pipeline Stages

The standard pipeline follows these stages:
*   **Identify**: Initial discovery.
*   **Engage (AI)**: Initial AI-driven outreach.
*   **Engage (Human)**: Sales rep Takes over.
*   **Offering**: Proposal sent.
*   **Finalizing**: Negotiation and contracts.
*   **Closed**: Deal finalized.

## Conversion Rules

*   **Lead → Contact**: Happens automatically when you send the first message via a Sequence.
*   **Lead → Account**: Happens automatically when an Opportunity is marked as Won.

See the [University Flow Architecture](/en/crm/university) for a deep dive into the automatic conversion logic.

title: Sequences: Automated Outreach
content:
# Sequences (formerly Outreach Campaigns)

Scale your sales development with multi-channel sequences and AI personalization.

## What is a Sequence?

A **Sequence** is a series of automated steps executed over time (Emails, SMS, Tasks).

## AI Personalization

Our AI engine personalizes every interaction:
*   **Icebreakers**: Scrapes prospect data to write unique openings.
*   **Tone Matching**: Adjusts messaging based on the project context.

## The Sequence Workflow

1.  **Project Setup**: Define the context and goal.
2.  **Lead Pool**: Assign a collection of leads.
3.  **Launch**: Start the automated sequence.

For a visual guide on this workflow, see the [Project Workflow Guide](/en/crm/university).

title: VoiceHub: AI Voice Agents
content:
# VoiceHub: AI Voice Agents

VoiceHub allows you to deploy "Digital Employees"—AI agents capable of natural voice conversations.

## Capabilities

*   **Inbound**: AI handles customer inquiries and routes calls.
*   **Outbound**: AI calls and qualifies leads automatically.
*   **Calendar Integration**: Agents can book meetings directly into your calendar.

## Setup

1.  **Persona**: Define the agent's name and character.
2.  **Voice**: Selection from 100+ realistic neural voices.
3.  **Knowledge Base**: Provide the agent with your company's FAQs and pricing.

title: FlowState: Visual Workflows
content:
# FlowState: Visual Workflow Builder

FlowState is a powerful visual editor for creating advanced automations within BasaltCRM.

## Building a Flow

Using a drag-and-drop interface, you can connect nodes to create logic:
*   **Triggers**: What starts the flow (e.g., "New Lead", "Deal Won").
*   **Actions**: What the system does (e.g., "Send Email", "Create Task", "Update Status").
*   **Logic Nodes**: If/Else conditions and Delays.

## Common Use Cases

*   **Lead Routing**: Automatically assign leads to specific reps based on territory.
*   **Deal Follow-up**: Schedule reminders if a deal stays in a stage for too long.
*   **Post-Sale Onboarding**: Trigger a series of tasks when a deal is closed.

title: Tasks & Project Management
content:
# Tasks & Project Management

Manage deliverables and team collaboration using Boards and Tasks.

## Workspace Organization

*   **Projects (Boards)**: Containers for specific initiatives.
*   **Views**: Kanban, List, and Gantt.
*   **Lead Pools**: Collections of leads assigned to specific projects for outreach.

## The Workflow

1.  **Admin** creates Project and Lead Pool.
2.  **Admin** assigns Pool and Project to a **Member**.
3.  **Member** executes outreach and manages tasks within that project.

Check the **Project Workflow** section in [University](/en/crm/university) for a visual walkthrough.

title: Invoices & Payments
content:
# Invoices, Contracts & Payments

Close the loop by turning signed deals into revenue.

## Billing Workflow

1.  **Mark Won**: Opportunity is closed successfully.
2.  **Generate Contract**: Using built-in E-Signatures.
3.  **Issue Invoice**: Sent directly to the client via a secure portal.

## PortalPay

Clients can view history and pay invoices using Credit Cards or Crypto through their dedicated portal.

title: API Reference & Developers
content:
# Developer Documentation

Build custom integrations with the BasaltCRM API.

## Quick Start

*   **Authentication**: Bearer Token (sk_live_...).
*   **Base URL**: `https://api.basaltcrm.com/v1`.
*   **Webhooks**: Subscribe to real-time events like `deal.won`.

For more developer resources, visit the [Developer Portal](/en/developers).
